metadata.title: Kuumba Made Vanilla Bean Fragrance 1/8 fl oz

categorization.explanation: The product is a vanilla bean fragrance, which fits best under the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category, specifically under the 'Fragrance' subcategory. As the product is not specified for men, it is categorized under 'Women's'.
